textTemplates.name: EmailMsgApprovedApplicants
textTemplates.text:
Victorian Homebuyer Fund

Application approved

Dear {!ApplicantFirstName}

Your application has been approved. Please find attached the final approval letter. 

Application Details
 
Case ID{!$Record.Case_Auto_Number__c}
Application ID{!$Record.ContractNumber}
Status{!$Record.Status}
Application approved on{!$Record.Final_Approval_Date__c}
Applicant(s){!$Record.ApplicantNames__c}
What's next?

Read the final approval letter for more information about your application.If you have any questions or need more information about settlement, contact your bank.
sro.vic.gov.au      Phone (03) 7020 1549

State of Victoria (State Revenue Office)
GPO Box 1641 Melbourne Victoria 3001  Australia

textTemplates.name: EmailMsgApprovedPFO
textTemplates.text:
Victorian Homebuyer Fund

Application approved

Dear {!$Record.Panel_Finance_Officer__r.FirstName}

The application you submitted has been approved. 

Application Details
 
Case ID{!$Record.Case_Auto_Number__c}
Application ID{!$Record.ContractNumber}
Status{!$Record.Status}
Application approved on{!$Record.Final_Approval_Date__c}
Applicant(s){!$Record.ApplicantNames__c}

   View Application   
sro.vic.gov.au      Phone (03) 7020 1549

State of Victoria (State Revenue Office)
GPO Box 1641 Melbourne Victoria 3001  Australia

textTemplates.name: EmailMsgCancelledApplicant
textTemplates.text:
Victorian Homebuyer Fund

Application cancelled

Dear {!ApplicantFirstName}

Your application has been cancelled. 

Cancellation Reason: {!$Record.Cancellation_Reason__c} 
Details: {!$Record.Rejection_Cancellation_Reason__c} 

Application Details
 
Case ID{!$Record.Case_Auto_Number__c}
Application ID{!$Record.ContractNumber}
Status{!$Record.Status}
Submitted on{!SubmissionDate}
Applicant(s){!$Record.ApplicantNames__c}
 
What's next?

If you have a question or need more information about the application, contact your bank.
sro.vic.gov.au      Phone (03) 7020 1549

State of Victoria (State Revenue Office)
GPO Box 1641 Melbourne Victoria 3001  Australia

textTemplates.name: EmailMsgCancelledPFO
textTemplates.text:
Victorian Homebuyer Fund

Application cancelled

Dear {!$Record.Panel_Finance_Officer__r.FirstName}

The application you submitted has been cancelled. 

Cancellation Reason: {!$Record.Cancellation_Reason__c} 
Details: {!$Record.Rejection_Cancellation_Reason__c} 

Application Details
 
Case ID{!$Record.Case_Auto_Number__c}
Application ID{!$Record.ContractNumber}
Status{!$Record.Status}
Submitted on {!SubmissionDate}
Applicant(s){!$Record.ApplicantNames__c}

If you have a question or need more information about this application, contact us on (03) 7020 1549.

   View Application   
sro.vic.gov.au      Phone (03) 7020 1549

State of Victoria (State Revenue Office)
GPO Box 1641 Melbourne Victoria 3001  Australia

textTemplates.name: EmailMsgFinanceInitiateFundsTransfer
textTemplates.text:
Victorian Homebuyer Fund

Application approved

Dear Finance Team,

An application for the Victorian Homebuyer Fund submitted for {!$Record.ApplicantNames__c} by 
{!$Record.Panel_Financier_Name__c} on {!$Record.CreatedDate} has been approved.

Please transfer the funds and then login to homebuyer application and update the
case sub-status to completed and provide Fund transfer date.

Application Details
Case ID{!$Record.Case_Auto_Number__c}
Application ID {!$Record.ContractNumber}
Status{!$Record.Status}
Submitted on {!$Record.CreatedDate}
Applicant(s) {!$Record.ApplicantNames__c}
Property{!PropertyAddress}
Funds${!$Record.VHF_Contribution__c}
Registration fee$112.40
PEXA fee$59.07
sro.vic.gov.au      Phone (03) 7020 1549

State of Victoria (State Revenue Office)
GPO Box 1641 Melbourne Victoria 3001  Australia

textTemplates.name: EmailMsgRejectedApplicant
textTemplates.text:
Victorian Homebuyer Fund

Application submitted

Dear {!ApplicantFirstName},

Your application has been rejected. Please see below details of your application. 

Rejection Reason: {!$Record.Rejection_Reason__c} 
Details: {!$Record.Rejection_Cancellation_Reason__c} 

Application Details
 
Case ID{!$Record.Case_Auto_Number__c}
Application ID{!$Record.ContractNumber}
Status{!$Record.Status}
Submitted on{!SubmissionDate}
Applicant(s){!$Record.ApplicantNames__c}
What's next?

If you have any questions or need more information about your application, contact your bank.
sro.vic.gov.au      Phone (03) 7020 1549

State of Victoria (State Revenue Office)
GPO Box 1641 Melbourne Victoria 3001  Australia

textTemplates.name: EmailMsgSettlementCancelled_FinanceTeam
textTemplates.text:
Victorian Homebuyer Fund

Settlement cancelled

Dear Finance Team,

An application for the Victorian Homebuyer Fund submitted for {!$Record.ApplicantNames__c} by {!$Record.Panel_Finance_Officer__r.Account.Name} on {!SubmissionDate} was approved and the settlement was cancelled. 

Application Details
 
Case ID{!$Record.Case_Auto_Number__c}
Application ID{!$Record.ContractNumber}
Submitted on{!SubmissionDate}
Applicant(s){!$Record.ApplicantNames__c}
Property{!PropertyAddress}
Comments{!$Record.Rejection_Cancellation_Reason__c}
sro.vic.gov.au      Phone (03) 7020 1549

State of Victoria (State Revenue Office)
GPO Box 1641 Melbourne Victoria 3001  Australia

textTemplates.name: EmailMsgSettlementCompletionDTF
textTemplates.text:
Victorian Homebuyer Fund

Settlement Completed

Dear Department of Treasury and Finance,

An application for the Victorian Homebuyer Fund submitted for {!$Record.ApplicantNames__c}
by {!$Record.Panel_Financier_Name__c} on {!SubmissionDate} was approved and settlement is complete.   

Application details
 
Case ID{!$Record.Case_Auto_Number__c}
Application ID{!$Record.ContractNumber}
Submitted on{!SubmissionDate}
Applicant(s){!$Record.ApplicantNames__c}
Property {!PropertyAddress}
Dealing number{!$Record.ApplicationCaseId__r.Dealing_Number__c}
sro.vic.gov.au      Phone (03) 7020 1549

State of Victoria (State Revenue Office)
GPO Box 1641 Melbourne Victoria 3001  Australia

textTemplates.name: EmailMsgSubmissionApplicants
textTemplates.text:
Victorian Homebuyer Fund

Application submitted

Dear {!ApplicantFirstName},

We've received your application. Please see below details of your application.   

Application Details
 
Case ID{!$Record.Case_Auto_Number__c}
Application ID{!$Record.ContractNumber}
StatusFinal Application Submitted
Submitted on{!SubmissionDate}
Submitted by {!$Record.Panel_Finance_Officer__r.Account.Name}
Applicant(s){!$Record.ApplicantNames__c}
What's next?

We will review your application and notify you of the outcome within 5 working days.
sro.vic.gov.au      Phone (03) 7020 1549

State of Victoria (State Revenue Office)
GPO Box 1641 Melbourne Victoria 3001  Australia

textTemplates.name: EmailMsgUpdateApplicants
textTemplates.text:
Victorian Homebuyer Fund

Application updated

Dear {!ApplicantFirstName},

Your application submitted through {!$Record.Panel_Finance_Officer__r.Account.Name} on {!SubmissionDate} to participate in the Victorian Homebuyer Fund has been updated.


Application Details
 
Case ID{!$Record.Case_Auto_Number__c}
Application ID{!$Record.ContractNumber}
Status{!$Record.Status}
Submitted on{!SubmissionDate}
Applicant(s){!$Record.ApplicantNames__c}
What's next?

If you have a question or need more information about your application changes, contact your bank.
sro.vic.gov.au      Phone (03) 7020 1549

State of Victoria (State Revenue Office)
GPO Box 1641 Melbourne Victoria 3001  Australia

textTemplates.name: EmailNotificationBodyToFinanceTeam
textTemplates.text:
Victorian Homebuyer Fund

Settlement cancelled

Dear Finance Team,

An application for the Victorian Homebuyer Fund submitted for
{{{Contract.ApplicantNames__c}}} by {{{Contract.Panel_Financier_Name__c}}} on {{{Contract.CreatedDate}}} was approved and the settlement was cancelled.

Application Details
Case ID{!$Record.Case_Auto_Number__c}
Application ID{!$Record.ContractNumber}
Submitted on {{{Contract.CreatedDate}}}
Applicant(s) {{{Contract.ApplicantNames__c}}}
Property{{{Contract.BillingAddress}}}
Cancellation reason {{{Contract.Rejection_Cancellation_Reason__c}}}
sro.vic.gov.au      Phone (03) 7020 1549

State of Victoria (State Revenue Office)
GPO Box 1641 Melbourne Victoria 3001  Australia

textTemplates.name: FundsTransferredVGSO
textTemplates.text:
Victorian Homebuyer Fund

Application approved - Funds transfer

Dear Victorian Government Solicitor's Office,

An application for the Victorian Homebuyer Fund submitted for

{!$Record.ApplicantNames__c} by {!$Record.Panel_Financier_Name__c} on {!$Record.Application_Submission_Date__c} has been approved.

Please find the application and funds transfer details below.


Application details
 
Case ID{!$Record.Case_Auto_Number__c}
Application ID{!$Record.ContractNumber}
Status{!$Record.Status}
Submitted on{!SubmissionDate}
Applicant(s){!$Record.ApplicantNames__c}
Property{!$Record.BillingAddress}
Funds transferred date{!$Record.Funds_Transferred_Date__c}
What's next?

Once settlement is complete, please reply to this email with the dealing number.
sro.vic.gov.au      Phone (03) 7020 1549

State of Victoria (State Revenue Office)
GPO Box 1641 Melbourne Victoria 3001  Australia

variables.description: The variable stores comma separated values for Finance team emails.
